doc.field: Woodrow Wilson letter to J. Elmer Christie
Woodrow Wilson letter to J. Elmer Christie

Autograph letter signed by Woodrow Wilson on letterhead of the President's Room, Princeton University, dated March 21, 1906, to J. Elmer Christie of Nyack, New York. In the one sentence letter Wilson thanks Christie for his kind letter of the twelfth and its words of appreciation for Wilson's "George Washington." For more information and to request this item, see the catalog record, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
